input: The dog barks loudly. The tree sways gently. The river flows swiftly.
validityText:
The input provided consists of three sentences: "The dog barks loudly.", "The tree sways gently.", and "The river flows swiftly.". According to the input specification, the input must be a paragraph of text containing at least three sentences. The input given satisfies this requirement as it contains exactly three sentences. There are no violations of the input specification as each sentence is complete and ends with a period, thus delineating them clearly as individual sentences.

No violation.
OK
